reviewText: An enjoyable view into life in Colonial Williamsburg, a wonderful and magical place at any time of the year, not only Christmas. This is a nice production. Enjoy.

I loved this DVD_but it could have been made better if there was a section on how to do craft projects for Christmas_and demos on recipes used during Colonial time. I had hoped for more information of substance to create a Wmsburg themed Christmas Party this year. It was enjoyable.
